item.title: CVE-2024-3825|2024-04-17T15:03:14.784Z -- Blazemeter -- BlazeMeter Jenkins plugin
item.description: Versions of the BlazeMeter Jenkins plugin prior to 4.22 contain a flaw which results in credential enumeration
